name: Uno Gelato
address: Uno Gelato, 2579 W Broadway, Vancouver, BC V6K 3T3, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Salted Caramel (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: Our classic dulce de leche inspired gelato, made with homemade caramel, has just the right sprinkling of Vancouver Island Sea Salt to make it a rich and golden experience.  Can you say La dulce vita! (Gluten-free).

hasMenuItem.name: Very Cherry (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: We’re sweet on our Italian Amarena sour cherry gelato, which is loaded with Swiss chocolate nuggets of Fleur de Cao, 70% cacao by Barry Callebaut, and made with wholesome B.C. cream and organic milk from Avalon Dairy. Pucker up for this popular Italian treat! (gluten free)

hasMenuItem.name: New Fashioned Chocolate (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: Our gelato version of the classic “Fudgsicle” brings back memories of chasing down the ice cream truck as a kid. New Fashioned Chocolate is a grown-up version of this classic frozen treat with natural cocoa by gourmet chocolatier Scharffen Berger. Enjoyable for people of all ages! (Gluten-free).

hasMenuItem.name: Midnight Chocolate (Vegan) (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy, dreamy, and no dairy, our Midnight Chocolate sorbetto marries the best artisanal chocolatiers Guittard’s black cocoa with 99% cocoa from Valrhona and non-alkalined cocoa from Venezuela.  All the chocolaty goodness without the guilt – so silky and deliciously healthy – you’ll think you’re dreaming!  (Gluten-free, Vegan).

hasMenuItem.name: Mint Chocolate Chip (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: Mint and chocolate are made for each other, and this refreshing treat is handcrafted with organic mint leaves grown in the Fraser Valley, along with cream and milk from the happy Avalon Dairy cows, and decadent nuggets of 70% cacao chocolate by gourmet Swiss chocolatier Barry Callebaut.  Pure frozen perfection,  indulge,  and enjoy! (Gluten-free).

hasMenuItem.name: Cookies & Cream (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description:
Do you twist, lick or dunk your Oreo cookie? We prefer blend! What could be more fun than blending an iconic chocolate cookie sandwich with fresh churned Avalon Dairy organic milk and cream from the Fraser Valley? A creamy creation that is for the kid in all of us!
(contains gluten).

hasMenuItem.name: Roasted Hazelnut (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description:
Round was she, beautiful and of noble aspect…” Inspired by Dante, our nocciola gelato is an autumn creation crafted with locally roasted hazelnuts from Italy, along with BC cream and organic milk from the happy Avalon Dairy cows, and a dash of Vancouver Island Sea Salt. Poetic. Epic. Divine!
(gluten free,contains nuts).

hasMenuItem.name: Passion Fruit Sorbetto (Vegan)(500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet and tart, our juicy sorbetto is made with just three ingredients: passion fruit from Colombia, organic sugar, and fresh BC water. This colorful and refreshing il frutto della passione will transport you to the tropics! (Gluten-free, Vegan).

hasMenuItem.name: Lavazza Espresso (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: Good coffee is like a great story: it’s a pleasure to be shared… Our Lavazza espresso gelato is made with intense, fresh-brewed Lavazza Arabica espresso mixed with some sweet and mild Colombian coffee along with wholesome BC cream and organic milk from Avalon Dairy.  As they say in Italy, “La Lavazza Paradiso in tazza!” (gluten-free,  contains caffeine).

hasMenuItem.name: Vanilla Bean  (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: The flavour of paradise, our all natural Madagascar vanilla gelato is crafted from beans renowned for their natural creamy and rich vanillin sweetness, grown on the tropical island of Madagascar off the coast of Africa. Our Maestro added organic milk and cream from Avalon Dairy and touch of organic cane sugar to this definitely not plain vanilla. (Gluten-free)

hasMenuItem.name: Mango Tango (Vegan)(500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: Called the “Champagne of Mangoes”, the Ataúlfo Mango from Mexico is soft, sweet, and juicy. Making it the perfecto variety for our Mango Tango sorbetto.  Enjoy the naturally rich,  sweet and surprisingly creamy flavor of this simple 3 ingredient Mango sorbetto,  we think you’ll agree it’s the “Champagne” of sorbettos! (gluten-free, vegan).

hasMenuItem.name: Akbar Mashti (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: A beloved Persian classic with fragrant saffron, rosewater, and rich pieces of Devonshire-style cream from Iran along with crunchy roasted pistachios from California.  This Persian delight is blended with wholesome B.C. cream and organic milk from Avalon Dairy in the Fraser Valley along with B.C. birch syrup by Sweet Tree Ventures in Quesnel and a pinch of organic cane sugar for added sweetness. (contains nuts,gluten free)

hasMenuItem.name: Coconut Lemon Loaf (1 slice)
hasMenuItem.description: A slice of coconut lemon loaf typically includes moist cake infused with lemon flavor, accented with coconut throughout.

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Macademia Banana Bread (1 slice)
hasMenuItem.description: A slice of banana bread enriched with chocolate and macadamia nuts, offering a sweet and nutty flavor profile.

hasMenuItem.name: Pumpkin Pecan Bread ( 1 slice)
hasMenuItem.description:
Vegan
Contains gluten

hasMenuItem.name: Salted Double Chocolate Cookie (1 item)
hasMenuItem.description: A salted double chocolate cookie typically includes rich dark chocolate dough mixed with chocolate chunks, finished with a sprinkle of sea salt.

hasMenuItem.name: Mint Chocolate Chip (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: Mint and chocolate are made for each other, and this refreshing treat is handcrafted with organic mint leaves grown in the Fraser Valley, along with cream and milk from the happy Avalon Dairy cows, and decadent nuggets of 70% cacao chocolate by gourmet Swiss chocolatier Barry Callebaut.  Pure frozen perfection,  indulge,  and enjoy! (Gluten-free).

hasMenuItem.name: Roasted Pistachio (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy gelato infused with roasted pistachio, delivering a rich, nutty flavor in every bite.

hasMenuItem.name: Akbar Mashti (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: A beloved Persian classic with fragrant saffron, rosewater, and rich pieces of Devonshire-style cream from Iran along with crunchy roasted pistachios from California.  This Persian delight is blended with wholesome B.C. cream and organic milk from Avalon Dairy in the Fraser Valley along with B.C. birch syrup by Sweet Tree Ventures in Quesnel and a pinch of organic cane sugar for added sweetness. hasMenuItem.name: Tiramisu (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description:
Creamy, soft and silky, one of Italy’s most popular desserts meets our signature gelato in this dreamy treat. Our maestro has taken the traditional flavours of Tiramisu with its intense espresso, rich Mascarpone cheese, cocoa powder and lady fingers and combined them with fresh cream and organic milk from the Fraser Valley. Elegant, classic and ever so delicious!
(contains gluten)

hasMenuItem.name: Roasted Hazelnut (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description:
Round was she, beautiful and of noble aspect…” Inspired by Dante, our nocciola gelato is an autumn creation crafted with locally roasted hazelnuts from Italy, along with BC cream and organic milk from the happy Avalon Dairy cows, and a dash of Vancouver Island Sea Salt. Poetic. Epic. Divine!
(gluten free,contains nuts).

hasMenuItem.name: Apple Pear Sorbetto (Vegan) (500ml Pint)

Our luscious apple pear sorbetto is made with gala apples, pears and organic cane sugar.
Gluten free, vegan

hasMenuItem.name: Thai Coconut (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: Our dreamy Coconut sorbetto is amazingly creamy, yet vegan and dairy free. We’ve blended sweet and tender coconuts, coconut milk and a touch of organic cane sugar, and topped this frozen treat with toasted coconut flakes. (gluten free, vegan)

hasMenuItem.name: Extra Gluten-free Cone
hasMenuItem.description: A gluten-free cone topped with a scoop of your choice of ice cream flavors: green tea, mango, vanilla, or strawberry.

hasMenuItem.name: Black Sesame & Raspberry Swirl (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: (Gluten-free)

hasMenuItem.name: Earl Grey Tea & Lavender (500ml Pint)
hasMenuItem.description: Bergamot infused black tea and dried lavender buds create a sophisticated bouquet in this French version of London Fog. Our maestro has blended a new aromatic and creamy gelato with local Granville Island Tea Co. Earl Grey tea, lavender from France and organic milk and cream from Avalon Dairy. Luxurious and fragrant, a delicious delight for all the senses! (Gluten-free)

review.reviewBody: Very Cherry (500ml Pint) is our favourite ice cream. The cherry tastes like real cherries, as it should. The balance between the tartness of the cherries and the creamy sweetness of the gelato is just right.  Note: a few blocks up the street Casareccio has a similar gelato with bit of dark chocolate in it which is also great but they don't sell it through doordash anymore.  Uno Gelato has pre-made pints that they keep in a deep freezer so they are frozen solid and transport very well by Doordash. Casareccio scooped their ice cream into pint containers in the moment and it gets a lot meltier which maybe why they stopped including it with doordash. Our other favourite flavours are Lavazza Espresso (500ml Pint) , Roasted Hazelnut (500ml Pint) and Roasted Pistachio (500ml Pint) . All of these are very creamy and the flavour of coffee, hazelnut or pistachio are all come through strongly. We like the Yuzu Citrus Sorbetto (Vegan) (500ml Pint) too but we order it more in the summer. To finish off a meal with a satisfying dessert Uno Gelato cannot be beat.
Very Cherry (500ml Pint) is even better than Ben nd Jerry's cherry Garcia
Akbar Mashti (500ml Pint) is such a unique flavor. Very delicate. Good stuff.

Best ice cream. Tastes just like a fudgesicle but not as artificial. 

Great delivery driver Zohreh!!
This is not ice cream, the texture of this thing is like eating air. Waste of money and would never eat this slog ever again.
